problems.title: Sum of Digits using Recursion
problems.description:
Problem Statement
Given a non-negative integer N, find the sum of its digits using recursion.

Input Format
Single integer N

Output Format
Single integer: sum of digits of N

Example
Input:
12345

Output:
15

Explanation: 1 + 2 + 3 + 4 + 5 = 15

problems.title: Reverse a String using Recursion
problems.description:
Problem Statement
Given a string S, reverse it using recursion and print the reversed string.

Input Format
Single line containing string S

Output Format
Print the reversed string

Example
Input:
hello

Output:
olleh
problems.examples:
Sample Input
hello
Sample Output
olleh
problems.constraints:
1 ≤ |S| ≤ 1000
String contains only lowercase English letters
hintsList: Base case: if string length <= 1 → return as is
